COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc
STRING: [Chris] “How about practicing together today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e
STRING: [Torta] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138
STRING: Even though we had just been interacting normally,
Torta tensed up and waited for my reaction when this
topic came up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: [Chris] “You told me to invite you any time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176
STRING: [Torta] “That's not what I really meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? So, what did you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2
STRING: I knew what she meant, but I had to ask.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2
STRING: [Chris] “No... I'm not, like, trying to force you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: [Torta] “Listen... That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216
STRING: [Chris] “So, what did you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248
STRING: [Torta] “Why are you inviting me, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: [Chris] “It's... Because I'm looking for a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c
STRING: [Torta] “So I'm a candidate?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: [Torta] “Do you really want me as your partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6
STRING: [Chris] “If I didn't want you at all, I wouldn't ask you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f8
STRING: [Torta] “At all... At all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30e
STRING: [Chris] “Do you not like the uncertainty?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340
STRING: [Torta] “No... So, will you answer a question? Who are
you partnering with me for?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x360
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x376
STRING: That was...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: For myself?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: For Torta?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39a
STRING: Or... Was it for Arie?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ae
STRING: [Torta] “Did Arie say something to you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c4
STRING: [Chris] “She did say something... But that's not why.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da
STRING: I didn't lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e6
STRING: I declared that it wasn't for Arietta, but if I was asked
who it was for once again, I probably would have frozen
up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: Even without that, I was at a loss for words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: [Torta] “So would you pair up with whomever Arie says?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44e
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x464
STRING: Torta spoke after a short silence, ignoring my answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x496
STRING: [Torta] “Fine... Let's practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ce
STRING: I followed Torta as she went into the hall, hurrying a
little to keep up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e4
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x516
STRING: [Torta] “You said you wanted to practice, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52c
STRING: [Chris] “That's true, but you know what I mean, don't
you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54c
STRING: Torta finally stopped when I said this, and looked me
straight in the eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57e
STRING: [Torta] “I know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x594
STRING: [Chris] “If... If you don't want to, Torta, you don't have

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c6
STRING: [Torta] “But you don't understand me, Chris. I'm not
saying I don't want to partner with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e6
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x618
STRING: [Torta] “It's just... I was just thinking that if you were
going to practice with me right after Arie told you to, I
would have liked it if you had chosen me earlier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x642
STRING: [Chris] “Then... What should I do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x674
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... Do you understand what I just said? I'm
in the wrong here. I just got mad for my own reasons.
So I'm sorry...just forget about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c2
STRING: Torta looked away from me and stared into space for a
while. Then she spoke lightheartedly as if she was over
it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fe
STRING: [Torta] “Getting it all off my chest made me feel better...
So let's practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71e
STRING: [Chris] “Got it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x750
STRING: [Torta] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x766
STRING: Lunch break had ended at some point, and there was
no sign of anybody in the halls.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: Nevertheless, it wasn't impossible for someone to pass
by.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ac
STRING: I was hoping nobody heard us, but the person I least
wanted to see poked her face around the corner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7de
STRING: [Cordell] “You two are pretty funny.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f4
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x826
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x844
STRING: [Cordell] “It was tough to figure out when I should show
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85a
STRING: [Chris] “So you were listening...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x878
STRING: [Cordell] “I heard you, to be more specific.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a2
STRING: [Chris] “W-Well, we're going to practice so excuse us.
Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ca
STRING: [Torta] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f4
STRING: [Cordell] “Do you have a minute before that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91e
STRING: Ms. Cordell stopped us as we tried to scurry off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x934
STRING: [Chris] “Wh-What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x952
STRING: [Cordell] “It seems you've been practicing with Tortinita
a lot lately.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x968
STRING: [Chris] “How did you know that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99a
STRING: [Cordell] “That doesn't matter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b0
STRING: I thought that it did...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d8
STRING: [Cordell] “Anyway, how about I observe your practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ee
STRING: [Chris] “You... You mean now? But it's time for Asino's
lesson.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2a
STRING: [Cordell] “Asino just asked me if he could take today's
lesson off. So as I'm free, I came looking for you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa54
STRING: [Chris] “Asino did?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6a
STRING: It wasn't unheard of for students to request lessons off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa80
STRING: Attendance wasn't taken for one-on-one lessons, or for
third years; our grades were based only on the two
seasonal concerts and the graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa0
STRING: That being said... It wasn't common.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaac
STRING: We were students, but it was our right to attend class,
not our duty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac2
STRING: I don't know if it could be said for everyone, but most of
the students that attended the school liked music, and
wanted to work in music in some form.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae2
STRING: So the few months before a graduation recital was the
time for students like myself to become serious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf8
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... So you were looking for me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2a
STRING: [Cordell] “Tortinita is here with you, after all. Will you let
me hear?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4a
STRING: [Chris] “Our performance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7c
STRING: [Cordell] “I don't think I'd want to hear anything else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb92
STRING: [Chris] “Uh, right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba8
STRING: Should I even say that I wasn't yet confident?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: But I was reluctant to refuse her with the excuse that
we hadn't had enough practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd4
STRING: Ms. Cordell had come all the way here to ask us, and I
could see Torta out the corner of my eye, looking at me
with an anxious expression .

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf4
STRING: [Chris] “Alright then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2e
STRING: If I refused Ms. Cordell once more...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3a
STRING: I thought Torta would be hurt again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc46
STRING: That she would think I was just doing what Arie's letters
were telling me to do; that I had no motivation, and was
just playing with her because I lacked options.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5c
STRING: But I was choosing to play with Torta now, and not
because of all of that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc72
STRING: Of course, nothing was final.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7e
STRING: However, that was the choice I made within the limited
time that I had, and here I was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8a
STRING: I didn't have much leeway, in any case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc96
STRING: [Chris] “Is that alright, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc8
STRING: [Torta] “I don't mind...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcde
STRING: [Chris] “Okay then. So is the classroom alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd06
STRING: [Cordell] “Yeah. I've gotten it all ready, so let's go right
in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd26
STRING: [Chris] “Understood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7a
STRING: [Cordell] “Now then, please begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb2
STRING: I got everything ready, and faced Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: Torta nodded silently to let me know she was okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdca
STRING: We couldn't fail here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd6
STRING: There would be no better opportunity to prove that I
chose Torta of my own volition.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdec
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, here we go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebe
STRING: [Cordell] “Quite good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed4
STRING: Ms. Cordell looked at Torta and me, and said this in her
usual tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeea
STRING: They were words of high praise from her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef6
STRING: By the way, it seemed that “Not bad” and “How like you,
Chris” were also compliments from Ms. Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0c
STRING: If she didn't like it, she'd just say, “Once more” over and
over again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf22
STRING: And when she gave up, she'd say, “Enough, that's all for
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf38
STRING: She was so cold that I thought that someone not used
to her would get depressed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4e
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6c
STRING: [Cordell] “You've worked hard in a short time as well,
Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9e
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb4
STRING: Torta bowed her head low to Ms. Cordell, and thanked
her once again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfca
STRING: [Chris] “In a short time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe8
STRING: [Cordell] “I said it before, didn't I? You've grasped what
you needed to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1008
STRING: I thought about it, and got some idea of what she
meant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1014
STRING: Today's incident included, the only person who could
be giving her information was Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102a
STRING: She probably came looking for us near the cafeteria
because of what he had told her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105c
STRING: [Cordell] “Anyway, I'm relieved. Just keep practicing like
that. But you're still far from perfect.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107c
STRING: [Chris] “We know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109a
STRING: [Torta] “Well, we'll get back to our practice now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b8
STRING: [Cordell] “Right. I guess I'll...go look for other students.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ce
STRING: [Chris] “Are you...bored, by any chance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: [Cordell] “Bored enough to watch students of mine
practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1126
STRING: She said this and smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1154
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, shall we continue?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1186
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119c
STRING: Torta answered, more cheerfully than before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a8
STRING: Then I truly felt that I was here for Torta, right in front of
me, and no one else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11be
STRING: It may have taken a little time for me to realize that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d4
STRING: But I didn't think it was too late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e0
STRING: This is what I thought as I looked at Torta smiling next
to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120a
STRING: I was able to focus more than usual on our continued
practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: We performed over and over again, amid the illusion
that our hearts were connected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1246
STRING: Like I was apologizing to someone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1252
STRING: Like I was trying to prove something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: I continued playing the Fortelle, over and over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d2
STRING: [Cordell] “Not enough practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e8
STRING: Ms. Cordell said this matter-of-factly, without a hint of
consternation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f4
STRING: It was true that we hadn't had enough practice, and
couldn't just produce good results at any time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130a
STRING: And we knew that we didn't do very well this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1320
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133e
STRING: [Cordell] “You don't have to apologize. Just practice
hard from now on.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135e
STRING: [Chris] “I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: [Cordell] “Do you really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a6
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d8
STRING: [Cordell] “Hearing what I did today, it seems you're the
problem, Chris. Tortinita's voice wasn't bad. Even
though it is her song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141e
STRING: [Torta] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1434
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I know that, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1460
STRING: [Cordell] “Is something on your mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1476
STRING: [Chris] “On my mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: [Cordell] “You're easily affected by that kind of thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14aa
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c8
STRING: [Cordell] “Looks like you have an idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14de
STRING: [Chris] “No... Everyone has one or two things they
worry about. It doesn't take a fortune-teller to see that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1506
STRING: [Cordell] “In any case, you've admitted it by saying that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1526
STRING: [Chris] “I wasn't denying it in the first place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: [Cordell] “And I wasn't saying it's anything bad. Just that
I'm sure there are people around who would listen to
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: It may have just been me, but Ms. Cordell looked at
Torta and seemed to shrug lightly as if she understood
everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158e
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway... I admit that I haven't practiced
enough. So we're going to start practicing again now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ca
STRING: [Cordell] “That would be best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e0
STRING: [Chris] “Let's go, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1612
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1628
STRING: We cleaned up and made to leave the room after a
light salutation when Torta bowed her head once more
and said politely,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1664
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1696
STRING: [Cordell] “Sure. I hope you let me listen again. I can't say
I'm always available, but if I do have time, I'll do that
much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fe
STRING: After that, we practiced like always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170a
STRING: We practiced over and over to fix the problems.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1716
STRING: But no matter how many times we played, we couldn't
get the feeling that our hearts were connected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172c
STRING: If there was anything on my mind, it was Torta right in
front of me; it couldn't be Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1742
STRING: If you asked me if there was someone I could talk to
about it, I would have given the name of a girl who
wasn't there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1758
STRING: Even so, I couldn't do that without the roundabout route
of writing letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178a
STRING: [Torta] “Good work today. Ask me again whenever you
want.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ae
STRING: Torta said this at the end with apparent calmness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ba
STRING: When I told her that I'd stay and practice, Torta said she
was impressed and left by herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d0
STRING: And so, I was left alone in the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f6
STRING: I closed my eyes, and thought lazily about what to do
while imagining the sound of the rain falling outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x185e
STRING: We went together to the practice room to practice as
usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1874
STRING: All throughout practice, I remembered Torta's words
and continued thinking about them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1892
STRING: “Would you pair up with whomever Arie says?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18cc
STRING: When it was all over, Torta finally spoke with apparent
calmness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18fe
STRING: [Torta] “Good work today. Ask me again whenever you
want.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1922
STRING: When I told her that I'd stay and practice, Torta said she
was impressed and left by herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1952
STRING: I closed my eyes, and thought lazily about what to do
while imagining the sound of the rain falling outside.
